page.title: 18Clubs
page.content: Many local pubs and{clubs}have a variety of teams including darts, snooker,pool,cricket,angling and football.Often contests in league form are played.Primary{schools}and{church} halls provide a meeting place for adults and children.These clubs include Brownies,Girls Brigade, Co-op Guilds,Womens Fellowship,Open House and Youth groups.The Comprehensive school provides a variety of evening activities.Some are of an artistic and creative nature (eg.Woodwork, Soft Furnishing).Others are of an educational nature (eg.Typing,Music) or a sporting nature (eg.Squash,Judo, Badminton). Firms or villages have formed{recreation,}sporting or keep fit clubs and use their own private facilities or those of schools.
